name: Rainbow of Sadness
description:
Artwork by Daniel Nobre
(acrylic paint on cotton canvas 09x12cm)

Lyrics by Daniel Nobre
Musical composition by Daniel Nobre and Gênesis Chagas
Arranged by Gênesis Chagas

Voice: Daniel Nobre
Backing vocals: Gênesis Chagas
Guitar: Gênesis Chagas
Percussions: Danilo Machado
Audio recording and mixing: Danilo Machado and Lucas Xavier

Lyrics:

Hold me 
Feel the emptiness, feel in my heart 
Hear me
Sing a lullaby to my dispair

Save me 
Take me where I have never been
Taste me
Filling me with something I don't know

Tell me what's happening with my mind
Tell me about the troubles of your life 
Tell me about the drugs you have been tried
Tell me why this tears drops from your eyes
